attributes.action: Introduce a Law that acknowledges Parent Alienation as a Criminal Offence
attributes.additional_details:
Parental Alienation is often met with one of the parents abusing the other by USING their child be that, mentally/emotionally, physically, sexually or neglectfully. The aggressor is able to manipulate the child into thinking, or behaving a certain way towards the other parent. Both recipients fall victim to such onslaughts, maiming children for life. Family Court/Cafcass appear ill equipped to handle this hence why we are calling on the government to HELP SAFEGUARD OUR CHILDREN.

IF WE RECOGNISE (CHILD) ABUSE IS A CRIMINAL ACT WHY IS PARENT ALIENATION NOT? THEY OFTEN GO HAND IN HAND.
attributes.background: We are asking the Government to treat Parent Alienation as an extremely serious matter. We request the law recognises this as a Criminal Offence which should then be punished as such.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565101
